message: Let's split it fairly, I'll give you a good deal!
Split it down the middle, no need to negotiate!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still looking for a better deal!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away all the power!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'll give you a slightly better deal this time!
I'm not getting any younger, I need a better deal now!
I'm getting a bit tired of negotiating, but I'll give you a slightly better deal this time... for now!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about splitting it fairly, I'll take what I can get now!
I'm not getting any younger either, take it or leave it!
I'm not going to get a better deal than this, take it or I'll walk away!
This is my final offer, take it or we'll both walk away with nothing!
Take it or leave it, I'm not going to give you a better deal than this. It's now or never!
